video.title: Jem and the Holograms
video.synopsis: Using a holographic computer she inherited from her father, Jerrica Benton turns herself and her pals into pop-music group Jem and the Holograms.

episodes.synopsis: Trying to save Starlight Music and the Starlight Foundation, Jerrica Benton discovers a computer that transforms her into a rock star named Jem.
episodes.title: The Beginning

episodes.synopsis: When a fire destroys the Starlight House, Jem tries to convince millionaire Howard Sands to help find a new place for the foster girls to live.
episodes.title: Disaster

episodes.synopsis: While shooting their first music video in Paris, Kimber grows jealous of Jem and considers leaving the Holograms to pursue a solo career.
episodes.title: Kimber's Rebellion

episodes.synopsis: When Jem and the Holograms are hired to headline a concert in Las Vegas, Eric Raymond and the Misfits set out to sabotage them.
episodes.title: Frame Up

episodes.synopsis: The Misfits will stop at nothing to prevent the Holograms from performing at Battle of the Bands, even if it means kidnapping Ashley and Jem.
episodes.title: Battle of the Bands

episodes.synopsis: As Jem and the Holograms begin to film their new movie, Starbright, Pizzazz devises a plan to steal the spotlight from them.
episodes.title: Starbright: Pt. 1: Falling Star

episodes.synopsis: Unable to get enough money to pay for Ba Nee's surgery, Jem and the Holograms must return to filming Starbright in order to raise the cash.
episodes.title: Starbright: Pt. 2: Colliding Stars

episodes.synopsis: After their lives are endangered on the set of the Misfits' movie, the Holograms must find an another way to make the money for Ba Nee's surgery.
episodes.title: Starbright: Pt. 3: Rising Star

episodes.synopsis: When philanthropist Sally Brand invites the Holograms to perform at a charity concert, the Misfits look for their own ways to cash in.
episodes.title: The World Hunger Shindig

episodes.synopsis: During the Holograms' concert tour of China, the Misfits steal Jerrica's JemStar earrings and make several copies to wear.
episodes.title: Adventures in China

episodes.synopsis: While on vacation in Colorado, Jem and the Holograms challenge the Misfits to a ski contest to raise money for the resort where they're staying.
episodes.title: Last Resorts

episodes.synopsis: When both bands are invited to compete at a rock fashion contest in Italy, the Misfits do everything in their power to beat the Holograms.
episodes.title: In Stitches

episodes.synopsis: As the annual Music Awards approaches, the Holograms become so focused that they fail to notice when three of the Starlight girls run away from home.
episodes.title: The Music Awards: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: While the Holograms search everywhere for the missing Starlight girls, the Misfits continue their reckless campaign to win at the annual Music Awards.
episodes.title: The Music Awards: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: A book publisher wants to create a rock fashion book with the Holograms, but the Misfits are determined to ruin the project.
episodes.title: The Rock Fashion Book

episodes.synopsis: Eric Raymond makes a public announcement that he will give $100,000 to the first person to reveal Jem's secret identity.
episodes.title: Broadway Magic

episodes.synopsis: Just as Jem and the Holograms are about to release their debut album, Eric Raymond sends one of his goons to steal it.
episodes.title: In Search of the Stolen Album

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to beat the Holograms in the Battle of the Music Stars, the Misfits use one of Eric's goons to kidnap Kimber before the competition.
episodes.title: Hot Time in Hawaii

episodes.synopsis: In a case of mistaken identity, Kimber is kidnapped by a group of criminals who think she is Princess Adriana of Morvania.
episodes.title: The Princess and the Singer

episodes.synopsis: Finding themselves marooned on a deserted island, the Holograms and the Misfits must find a way to work together if they want to be rescued.
episodes.title: Island of Deception

episodes.synopsis: Jem and the Holograms encounter an elderly singer who is embittered over how they covered his popular 1950's song "Rock and Roll Is Forever.
episodes.title: Old Meets New

episodes.synopsis: Eric Raymond does everything in his power to destroy the race car that Starlight Music is sponsoring at the Indy 500.
episodes.title: Intrigue at the Indy 500

episodes.synopsis: When the Holograms exclude the Misfits from their upcoming Jem Jam benefit concert, the Misfits retaliate by trying to ruin the event.
episodes.title: The Jem Jam: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Jem and the Holograms struggle to save their Jem Jam benefit from the Misfits' underhanded attempts to wreck the event.
episodes.title: The Jem Jam: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: When their art director is framed for a serious crime, Jem and the Holograms help him search for the real culprit.
episodes.title: Culture Clash

episodes.synopsis: With a big prize on the line, the Holograms try to convince Jerrica to bring back Jem so they can compete against the Misfits.
episodes.title: Glitter and Gold

episodes.synopsis: After Shana leaves the Holograms, the group decides to host a talent search to find their next drummer. The Misfits search for a new member as well.
episodes.title: The Talent Search: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the Holograms deliberate over which semi-finalist will be their new drummer, the Misfits try to bribe one of them to reveal Jem's secret identity.
episodes.title: The Talent Search: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Kimber faces public humiliation when the Misfits steal her diary and give it to a tabloid magazine. Will she be able to cope with the ensuing scandal?
episodes.title: The Scandal

episodes.synopsis: When Jem starts having public meltdowns and temper tantrums, the rest of the Holograms confront her about her behavior before it destroys her career.
episodes.title: One Jem Too Many

episodes.synopsis: The Holograms and the Misfits find themselves in an interesting predicament when Kimber and Stormer quit their bands and form a duo.
episodes.title: The Bands Break Up

episodes.synopsis: An obsessed fan goes to great lengths to learn Jem's identity and lures her to a replica of Starlight Mansion, where actors impersonate her friends.
episodes.title: The Fan

episodes.synopsis: While Jem and the Holograms help Video create a film featuring their fathers for the Father's Day banquet, Kimber is depressed that her father's gone.
episodes.title: Father's Day

episodes.synopsis: In a treasure hunt to promote literacy, the Holograms try to help the Starlight Girls win fair and square, while the Misfits try to cheat and win.
episodes.title: The Treasure Hunt

episodes.synopsis: When Jem and the Holograms accompany Video to Mexico to film their new music video at an Aztec temple, the Misfits are determined to beat them to it.
episodes.title: Aztec Enchantment

episodes.synopsis: Jem and the Holograms are invited to appear in a televised special, but how will there be a show when the girls mysteriously disappear one by one?
episodes.title: Music is Magic

episodes.synopsis: After the Misfits publicly humiliate jazz trumpet player Tapps Tucker on television, Jem and the Holograms try to help him reunite his famous quartet.
episodes.title: The Jazz Player

episodes.synopsis: The Holograms are eager to submit their new music video about friendship to a contest, but Danse injures her leg during filming.
episodes.title: Danse Time

episodes.synopsis: Roxy's illiteracy has become a problem for the Misfits, so when she wins the lottery, she leaves the group and heads home to Philadelphia.
episodes.title: Roxy Rumbles

episodes.synopsis: When the new girl at Starlight House copes with depression from losing her parents by turning to drugs, Ashley and the Holograms try to help her.
episodes.title: Alone Again

episodes.synopsis: When a greedy media mogul tries to shut down a local radio station, Jem and the Holograms attempt to save it, with help from some college students.
episodes.title: Kjem

episodes.synopsis: As the Holograms and their friends try to restore an old opera house for their concert on Halloween, they encounter a series of spooky mishaps.
episodes.title: Trick or Techrat

episodes.synopsis: Jem and the Holograms are invited to perform in Washington, D.C., but then Synergy is apprehended by the government and the president goes missing.
episodes.title: The Presidential Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Jealous of all the attention Jem and the Holograms are getting on their national train tour, the Misfits set out to veer their travels off course.
episodes.title: Rock 'n Roll Express

episodes.synopsis: When the Holograms are asked to don the famous jewels of pirate Jean Lafete during the Mardi Gras parade, the Misfits attempt to steal them.
episodes.title: Mardi Gras

episodes.synopsis: Jem and the Holograms must find a way to stop Eric Raymond and the Misfits from building a factory that will destroy a natural seal habitat in Alaska.
episodes.title: The Middle of Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: The Holograms encounter a modern-day Robin Hood on their trip to England. When he's captured by an oppressive lord, the Holograms try to rescue him.
episodes.title: Renaissance Woman

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's on a quest to locate the magical city of Shangri-La, but finding it soon becomes a matter of life and death for Pizzazz and Roxy.
episodes.title: Journey to Shangri-La

episodes.synopsis: The Misfits use a time machine to transport Jem and the Holograms back in time so they won't be able to headline the World History of Music Concert.
episodes.title: Journey Through Time

episodes.synopsis: When Jetta convinces the Misfits that she comes from an aristocratic family in England, the group travels to London and causes problems.
episodes.title: Britrock

episodes.synopsis: While cleaning out the attic, Jerrica and Kimber find their father's diary and learn of the missing records from one of their mother's performances.
episodes.title: Out of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Jem must handle the jealousy of another actress when they're both nominated for a coveted award. Kimber gets caught in a complicated love triangle.
episodes.title: Hollywood Jem: Part 1: For Your Consideration

episodes.synopsis: Kimber tries to sort out her complicated love life as Jerrica copes with the pressures of Hollywood and prepares to attend a prestigious awards show.
episodes.title: Hollywood Jem: Part 2: And the Winner Is¿

episodes.synopsis: Jerrica Benton and Eric Raymond are both vying for the new band the Stingers to join their label, but are they more trouble than they're worth?
episodes.title: The Stingers Hit Town: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Stingers continue to wreak havoc in both the Holograms' and the Misfits' lives. Eric Raymond proposes an offer the Stingers can't refuse.
episodes.title: The Stingers Hit Town: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Determined to join the Misfits, Clash goes to great lengths to play a prank on the Holograms in an effort to prove she's good enough to be a member.
episodes.title: Video Wars

episodes.synopsis: When Jem lands the role of Beauty in the new rock opera "Beauty and the Beast," will her obsession with mastering the part affect her performance?
episodes.title: Beauty and the Rock Promoter

episodes.synopsis: Jem and the Holograms travel with Danse to Yugoslavia, where they plan to film a music video and help Danse uncover her parents' mysterious past.
episodes.title: Homeland, Heartland

episodes.synopsis: Jerrica gets entangled in a complicated love "square" with Rio and Riot when the Holograms are slated to do a concert with the Stingers in Greece.
episodes.title: Midsummer Night's Madness

episodes.synopsis: Feeling overstressed, Jem disappears with Riot to Mexico, which gives Pizzazz the perfect opportunity to take control of Starlight Music.
episodes.title: The Day the Music Died

episodes.synopsis: Jealous that the Holograms are headlining a magic-themed benefit concert instead of the Stingers, Rapture tries to dupe the concert sponsor.
episodes.title: The Old Houdini Magic

episodes.synopsis: A new fashion designer wants to design clothes for Jem and the Holograms but can't take their constructive criticism, so the Stingers try to woo her.
episodes.title: Straight from the Heart

episodes.synopsis: After a near-death experience, Minx considers changing her bad-girl ways, but will being nice to the Holograms all the time drive her over the edge?
episodes.title: A Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: When Riot's mother ends up in the hospital, can Jem help Riot and his father put aside their differences so they can help her to recover?
episodes.title: Riot's Hope

episodes.synopsis: Ba Nee's futile search for her long-lost father leaves her depressed, causing Jem and the Holograms to conduct a search of their own.
episodes.title: A Father Should Be
